about_the_game:
I love the High School Affiliated to Normal University:
This is an online connection game,
In this game, you will control a character who can randomly visit scenes in the High School Affiliated to Normal University.
You can upgrade by defeating monsters, and they will be reborn at fixed points.
You can use the A.D.W.S on the keyboard to move, the left mouse button to attack with swords, and the right mouse button to attack with spells.
If you are a classmate or graduate of the High School Affiliated to Normal University, it is recommended that you enter your class number.


The latest update is as follows (03/09)
1. There are 9 main types of monsters, each monster has 4-5 color versions, and the maximum level of the monster is 200.
2. Starting from level 1, a character will gain 100 points and gold coins. These 100 points will determine your initial game experience.
3. The character's death will count down and reborn. As the level increases, the countdown time may be as long as 30 seconds or 60 seconds.
4. Reach the specified level within the time, and a piece of super high-level equipment will be randomly distributed, and the cycle will be repeated 10 times in total.


feature:
- Nostalgic school song music
- Featured and realistic modeling
- Online interactive games


About the origin of game development:
This is an online game about the scene of the High School Affiliated to Normal University,
The developer is a mathematics teacher at the Central China Normal University. He became interested in making games because he was a student in the Department of Digital Media.
I taught myself blender and unity for more than a year and spent another whole year building the campus scene of the attached middle school.
Currently, I have used this work to get admitted to the Graduate School of Digital Media Design Department of Yunlin University of Science and Technology.

My C# programming ability is relatively weak, so if I encounter a bug, it will take several weeks to resolve it. Please forgive me.
This game is free. I have paid the annual server fee of 4,000 yuan. Up to 100 people can be online at the same time.

Modeling:
The first one to model was the central part of the country, so it was the most detailed but the technique was the roughest.
Each of the subsequent buildings takes about half a month to complete, and may be different from some of the current conditions. We will slowly correct them when time allows.

Game update goals:
1. Currently, only minor updates can be made before the start of school in September.
Because I need to make a place-creating intelligent design-type game (introducing Zhongxing New Village), and use the work to find a mentor.
It will mainly be made into a mobile game, and a copy will also be placed on Steam.

2. Update the target later and release it around the end of the year or the new year.
The current attack modes are only slashing and spells, but the attack explosion range and spell explosion range can be increased.
In the new year, many other optional auxiliary skills or passive skills will be added, and skill points will be obtained with specific tasks attached.
From time to time, there will be monsters in the playground that exceed the player's level, and you need to cooperate to defeat them to get rewards.
At present, player attacks against players are ineffective, but as you go to the basement, the further away from the ground, the lower the player's damage reduction will be.
Start making some easter eggs in corners of the campus to surprise everyone.



common problem:
1. Why can’t the mouse move the game perspective.
I spent a month on this problem, but the discomfort caused by the game lens violently hitting surrounding objects (especially going up and down stairs) was too strong.
After adding some code, the improvement is limited, so it is currently on hold. However, I personally hope that I can use the mouse to move the perspective.
If you have some ideas or suggestions, we can discuss them with each other, thank you.

2. The computer is stuck when playing games.
When making the modeling, 2K quality images were used, so it was found that it was very time-consuming in accumulation, so as to reduce the number of points and faces for modeling.
The code may use too many loops for timing, but I don’t know how to deal with advanced C# methods. I am learning.
It is recommended to use a graphics card of 1070 or 2060 or 3050 or above


sponsor:
If you want to sponsor a little bit of the tuition for graduate school for the next two years and the cost of the high-speed train to Yunlin every week, there is a small QR code at the end of the left hand corner of the map that can help me. Thank you.
